Text: AVI? Let me guess.... another HARD coded subtitles? the is no version with removable subs?

Thanks for this torrent! Great anime
I can't understand why the people complained about the unremovable subtitles. It's written in the torrent title "Eng sub". If you don't like it don't take it!
Thanks Sushi, I was considering buying this for Ghibli, but the only sources in the US were private collectors... no point feeding them, so here I am.
Sorry about the subs, but this was what I would prefer when looking for titles so I did it that way.  Hope everyone likes it anyways!
